description:
Lose the paper maps.

Maprika lets you see where you are on real maps. Easily locate your friends and family,and stay informed about the places you're going.

The best mapping solution for ski resorts, national parks, and campuses.

FEATURES:

* Locate yourself on any of the 3000+ available maps of ski resorts, theme parks, university campuses, and hiking trails.

* Browse or search our constantly growing map collection by location or by name.

* Find your friends on any of these maps.

* Make your own maps and share them with the Maprika community.

* Set meetings with your friends

* Record GPS tracks and show them real-time; export tracks and view them on your computer

* Find nearby businesses

* See local weather, snow reports, and Twitter feeds for resort maps.

* Maprika maps are saved to the phone's memory, allowing for use in out of service areas.


For more information and support, please visit http://www.maprika.com/

Note: Maprika can be configured to track your location in the background. Continuous use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: GPS on ski map by Maprika
